title._content: Image taken from page 193 of '[China: in a series of views, displaying the scenery, architecture and social habits of that ancient empire. Drawn ... by T. Allom. With historical and descriptive notices by the Rev. G. N. Wright.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[China: in a series of views, displaying the scenery, architecture and social habits of that ancient empire. Drawn ... by T. Allom. With historical and descriptive notices by the Rev. G. N. Wright.]" Author: WRIGHT, George Newenham. Contributor: ALLOM, Thomas. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10055.f.17." Volume: 02 Page: 193 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1858 Publisher: London Printing & Publishing Co. Edition: [Another edition.] The Chinese Empire illustrated: being a series of views from original sketches ... by T. Allom, Esq., displaying the scenery, architecture, social habits, &c., of that ancient and exclusive nation. With historical and descriptive letterpress by the Rev. G. N. Wright. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003983034 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
